metadata.name: Loss Of Balance #1
metadata.description:
**Loss Of Balance** is the 1st Music Visual created for the acoustic pop song, **Nightingale** by **Teresa Tseng**. This is the 1st out of 3 mints.

We all face obstacles every day that challenge our values, morals, and identity. What we believe in, who we choose to love, and who we are, are constantly being judged and questioned by society and our environment. Under all these external pressures and influences, itâ€™s easy to lose our way and forget what we truly stand for and our reason for existence.

  Listen to **Nightingale** [here](https://open.spotify.com/track/0AhQ6Kjn3bwHMj5UYxNxml?si=80161d1aee0544d2=). 

- Performed by Teresa Tseng
- Animation by Yaga Animation
- Music & Lyrics by Teresa Tseng, Jay Fung, T-Ma
- Produced by T-Ma

Presented by [Blue Moon Productions](https://www.bluemoonprods.com/) X [Yaga Animation](https://yagaanimation.com/).
